name: 71" Heavy-Duty Steel Locker Cabinet (6-Door 6-Tier) - Secure Storage for School Lockers, Office Employee, Gym & Home Organization - Industrial Metal Lockers
short_description: Innovative Features: NAME HOLDERS on doors are handy in shared spaces for quick identification. The VENTILATION design lets air circulate, keeping it fresh and avoiding odors, great for gym items. The COMBINATION LOCK is convenient and secure, allowing you to set your own combo for easy access while safeguarding your belongings.

Enhanced Safety Measures: Safety and stability matter. This gym locker has 2 anti-tilt holes on the back plate. Use expansion screws to fix it to the wall. The design keeps it secure and stable, even with heavy items like gym weights or office files.

Dimensions and Storage Capacity: This remarkable metal locker boasts a size of 70.8H * 15W * 17D inches. With its well-thought-out partitioned design, it offers an excellent storage option for all your essentials, whether it's gym equipment that needs a proper place to be stowed away, or various personal belongings that you want to keep organized.

Sturdy and Durable Build: Made of premium cold rolled steel, the locker is durable. Its electrostatic powder spray makes the surface anti-rust, odor-free, moisture-proof and easy to clean, staying nice with little maintenance effort.

Easy Assembly Process: We offer a step-by-step manual for assembly. Even if you're not good at DIY, it's easy to assemble. If you have questions during use or assembly, our customer service will respond within 24 hours for a smooth experience.

Father's Day Gifts You'll Actually Use: Heavy-duty steel locker – organizes tools, gear & power tools. Build dad's dream garage! Whether it's for a friend, your significant other, or a father who loves storage storage, this thoughtful and practical gift is sure to be a hit.
